post.name: Jocelyne Jeannot
post.comments:
I didn't know Clinton much but the few memories I have of him will stay with me forever. I talked to him recently and he gave me a very compelling perspective of the importance of priorities in life. I will certainly remember this conversation and remember it in everything I do.
I will be updating my Relay page to be in memory of my uncle Clinton. If you would like to support my efforts in my college's American Cancer's Society Relay For Life Event please checkout: http://main.acsevents.org/site/TR/RelayForLife/RFLFY09EA?px=4856217&pg=personal&fr_id=13944
